testcase.classname: F_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid user and password
testcase.system-out: When user go to login page..................................................passed When user login with User "bob@example.com" and "10203040"..................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed Then Logout.................................................................passed

testcase.classname: F_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with locked user and password
testcase.system-out: When user login with User "alice@example.com" and "10203040"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then Error returned to user "Locked"........................................passed

testcase.classname: F_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with NotMatched user and password
testcase.system-out: When user login with User "1@2.com" and "f-o-o".............................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then Error returned to user "NotMatched"....................................passed

testcase.classname: F_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with Empty user and password
testcase.system-out: When user login with User "" and "".........................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then Error returned to user "EmptyUser".....................................passed

testcase.classname: F_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with user and Empty password
testcase.system-out: When user login with User "bob@example.com" and ""..........................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then Error returned to user "EmptyPass".....................................passed
